name: The Sports Fury: Christmas Chaos
description:
The Sports Fury: Christmas Chaos was a short one-screen, 2D game developed for the creators of the YouTube channel "The Sports Fury".  The game features Josh and Shawn of The Sports Fury as well as appearances by YouTubers Philly.500, UCF Jaguar, and the Waterboy Report.

The game has you playing as Josh.  Josh's co-host, Shawn, has licked the antler of a reindeer which has him loopy on reindeer magic.  Shawn has hijacked Santa's sleigh and is flying back and forth above The House of Fury dropping items from the sleigh.

The object of the game is to see how long you can survive.  Dodge the objects that cause pain while collecting presents and beer he is throwing.

Quick Notes:

Shawn throws objects randomly such as toilets, chainsaws, and more.  Each level you achieve presents a new object until the final object (car) is reached.  

If you hear "dilly dilly", Shawn just tossed a bottle of beer.  Collect that for health.

If you hear "it's eggnog time yo", Philly.500 or Dingbat Claus are taking a break from shooting at you.  Watch for their timers.

If a present touches fire, it is no longer collectable and will cause damage if it hits you.

*NOTE* Game contains curse words and references to alcoholic beverages.

This was just a quick little game for the laughs.  Check it out if you like.  At this time, no plans to update it. Developed in Unity.
